title: Chad on edge as rebels threaten to advance on capital after president's death
content:
1. Chad on edge as rebels threaten to advance on capital after president's death  Reuters
  2. Chad's opposition denounces appointment of Deby's son as 'coup'  Al Jazeera English
  3. Fighting Insurgency: A Look Into The Life Of Idriss Déby  TVC News Nigeria
  4. A warrior dynasty in Chad will do little to end Islamist threat  Financial Times
  5. Déby offered Chadians hope, but ended up leaving a terrible legacy  The Citizen
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

Chad's opposition denounces appointment of Deby's son as 'coup'  Al Jazeera English

localize.title: 大統領の死後、反乱軍が首都への進攻を脅かし、チャドは危機に瀕しています。
乍得局势紧张，叛军威胁在总统死亡后向首都推进
乍得局勢緊張，叛軍威脅在總統死亡後向首都推進
